name: Simple Whiz Spades - Card Game
description:
Simple Whiz Spades is your favorite trick-taking card game, now 100% free on any iOS device. Challenge intelligent computer opponents to as many games as you like, without worrying about lives, timers, or other limitations. Lead with trump, avoid taking your partner’s tricks, and track cards as you bid your way to victory.

Simple Whiz Spades is a twist on one of the most popular card games in the world, Spades. Whiz Spades is played in pairs using a traditional 52 card deck, and is closely related to other trick-taking games like Hearts, Euchre, Bridge and Whist! The objective for each partnership is to take at least the number of tricks that were bid. Players are only allowed to bid nil or the number of spades in their hand. No blind bids!

Enjoy this fun family card game favorite, and download Simple Whiz Spades today!

GAME FEATURES

• Play as much as you want, for free!
• Classic look and feel
• Clever computer opponents
• 3 levels of difficulty
• 3 game speeds to choose from
• Large, easy to read cards
• Ability to play offline
